document.description: BAD BAD ATTITUDE AT FAST FOOD RESTAURANT Golden Corral Has Lost ... Wrote in thier own tip on the credit card reciept ... Be ware of what you eat from Julio's A&W ...
document.body:
Serving food with a rat/mouse feces problem. Credit Card Fraud Unfriendly Restaurant Experience Capital One not disputing a charge BAD BAD ATTITUDE AT FAST FOOD RESTAURANT Golden Corral Has Lost its Glitter Cockroach in a restaurant APPLEBEES WILKES-BARRE--GOING DOWNHILL INSULT BY ORICO RESTUARANT EMPLOYEES Terrible Food and Service Restaurant having naked woman in center Wrote in thier own tip on the credit card reciept Everyman - horrible experience coffee price increase Pepin Restaurant AZ- Terrible Service - Place is Falling Apart Food omg very disgusting Watch what you are being charged Hornswaggled, or, the worst dining experience ever Shoeless Joes Don't eat at this Denny's Filthy KFC restaurant Restaurant with bad hygiene Unfriendly Friendlys bad and rude service mobilink gsm and maharaja restaurant Very poor restaurant service Granja De Oro Worst Dining Experience Wheelchair discrimination 410 Bank Street Aladdin's Natural Eatery Bad service Racist Restaurant Owner Father's Day Discrimination Candies served me nonveg and i had ordered a veg roll and i am a pure vegetarian Food Unsatisfactory Restaurant quality of food and service No Sorry for Us GRATUITY SCAM&RUDE SERVICE DON'T EAT AT FRIENDLY'S! Native New Yorker Restaurant Management Problems? Roaches at COOL CAFE (SAT - VANCE JACKSON) T.G.I. Fridays is Gross Denny's Restaurant POOR BUSINESS PRACTICE La Strada restaurant in Merrick - stay away! Restaurant Complain - Poor Service Terrible Attitude and Service Worst Restaurant Experince Ever The $200 Quesadilla Bad Service / Poor Management Chili's Restaurant Lakewood Ranch, FL restaurant refund? Be ware of what you eat from Julio's A&W Restaurant In Vegreville Alberta Sucks B Rated Cafe Threatens over 400 bad service Skyway Restaurant, Blue Mountains, Australia Macy's of Chicago Northland Fire&Security, Ansul System JULIE THE CRAZY GENERAL MANAGER BAD FOOD/ BAD SERVICE Perkins Family Restaurant Arby's Restaurant in York, PA Piece of glass in meal Park Place Cafe and Bakery Bad Restaurant Experience Restaurant Goose Landing Chicago Illinois Restaurant I want to make complaints to KFC restaurant in Wandswoth, London, UK Restaurant Complaint Perkins Restaurant - Millington, Tn. 01Jul07 and 08Jul07 Majors restaurant at Indigo golf club in Daytona restaurant complain Sri Thai Restaurant Dublin CA \ Bad treatment chinese restaurant Emeril's Restaurant Instawares Restaurant Supply Dallas BBQ Restaurant / Terrible Customer Service Service at Wendys Restaurant Carini'S Restaurant Kentucky Fried Chicken - The worst service in any restaurant ever Restaurant equipment thai restaurant Complaint About The Manager Paul Allen @ Holderness Road McDonalds Restaurant (Number 298) Rainbow Restaurant Taqueria Alonzo, Mexican Restaurant Cha-Am Restaurant in Vallejo, CA Attention: Powerhouse Restaurant and Brewery No Longer Needs Customers.
